frontmatter.title: Micro Frontend Article Notes
frontmatter.description: These are some pertinent quotes from my reading of the Micro Frontend article.

frontmatter.title: Using Git Feature Branches
frontmatter.description: When working on a larger team, it is sometimes easier to work from a feature branch and then merge that branch back into master/main. This post describes how I utilize feature branching.

frontmatter.title: What Should I Test
frontmatter.description: When testing code, which portions should be tested and why. This post outlines those concepts along with a lot of resources for additional reading.
